name: Streadata.io API Gallery - eBay
description: This is a repository of ebay APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: eBay
apis.description: Buy and sell electronics, cars, fashion apparel, collectibles, sporting goods, digital cameras, baby items, coupons, and everything else on eBay, the worlds online marketplace
